body: This is the best doujin I've read too bad it only has minor sex scenes sigh

@Cuckerspaniel774 You're a cockerspaniel because you think you're Labrador or Rottweiler when you're just a simple poser. If you couldn't figure out the ending, you were never truly one of us Alphas. Go read more, maybe then you will learn to start discerning a clue. How can one call themselves a true NTR connoisseur when they can't even figure out the ending???

Really, she got fucked just like that? And got obsessed with sex afterwords? A shame that the beating scene was skipped.
I can't blame the other guy, I normally hate ntr but the guy who stole the girl did it fair. It's not like they were going out, in other words the girl is free and the dude win the girl.

Nice, even better than the knight story

More people should educate themselves on what NTR is. It does not have to be in relationship to cause NTR. Example, your crush who you forget now is having a wedding. That is NTR whether you dated her or not before ( still like her or not, you did like her in the past). Because you basically lost her, forever as a man meaning you are less capable as a man than the one who is now fucking her in their happy house. Sure you are not a cuck ( which is saying that you don't get hard on this) but you still got NTRed. Basically.

@yeuvid Not NTR?? Did you deny and ignore the meaning of NTR because it happen to be your experience?? Sure they are not dating here but this is still NTR because he lost her to some dude. Did you lose someone else  that you don't want to acknowledge this as NTR at all?? Face reality, man
nice to see Hayao(the real mc) is a nice guy, i liked this very much

not ntr but I like what the author did here with the feelings and emotions that are shown here, yeah it lacked a lil bit more of sex panels but the thing to FAP here is not just the sex...
7.5/10

To be honest this type of NTR situation really does happen in irl(except for the girl getting addicted by sex) which is kinda realistic. But yeah the NTR is weak and theres no fapable panels in this hentai which is 3/10.
@Amir Syarifudin If you can get bitches, then why the fuck are you here ? What? Did your "bitch" put you in the doghouse? Gotta resort to jacking off to hentai doujins now?
@Cuckerspaniel774 [I don't know the meaning of the cryptic message on pg41] Because you're a dumb cuck. Like the MC, you would totally get cucked over irl, POS.

poster.username: A V E P A R T H E

body:
Honestly, seeing NTR has rotten my mind to such point where I can only see women as whores, despite that being not entirely true. What keeps baffling me about NTR stories is take on the female protagonists. Just as SchrodingerZ said, a personality of a lobotomized, half-dead slob. It is to be understood that these are just for selling and profiting. Makes me wonder why Japan is so obsessed with these stories.
"[...] lacks any realism on the subtleties of the hearts of man and woman" ergo, they just love to fuck. Props to the girl being a slut, tho. It's reality's depiction what counts lol
Very tasty and all, I like the art of this author ... But, the NTR is kind of weak here ... What does Page 41 mean? I could not understand it. lmao
I love it when the dude that NTRing is a decent and confident Chad. I'm tired seeing bashful indecisive protagonists getting all the girls for doing nothing.
This style drawing reminds of shoujo romance manga. Particularly female character. Makes my heart go doki doki. The story plot ofc is amazing. Hope there's a sequel.
If the MC wants to be spiteful, he could record them and post it on both the underground student website (you know there is one) and email to the school anomalously. But he looks too wimpy.

This is weak ntr (as hentai) although its one of the most realistic ntrs you can observe in real life. People should understand life should be mostly like "go and get it" when it comes to boy/girl relations. NTRd character wasn't even actually NTRd because he was just less interested towards the girl or more doubtful about their situation. Other guy was open, honest and moved forward.
He tried to know her (by reading her pages) get alone with her (as waiting her to come), asked her for a date (with no anxiety), sp he did what is supposed to be done when you want a girl. This could be for nothing if girl didn't come, but she was open for new adventure and liked him so went to date.
At that moment it is over. I mean even in real life. Scored 1-0. Girl, after all, knew you wanted her and accepted.

Only thing left for guy was to be open to her (he told her he loves her and wanted to date)
And girl was still fine with it, didn't friendzone him or abandon him. Scored 2-0

Sex was easy 3-0
What's the detail at the end? I can't quite get it
It's never gonna be NTR if you weren't together in the first place
Cucked/Netorared characters among these types of doujins are always welcomed by us, the Warped Fragments. A broken soul can be molded into a weapon of mass chaos.
Instead of writing a dumb textwall, why don't you try to get some bitches instead lmao
God I love the comments on the NTR ones
I love the art but weak ntr, or its just me getting used to pain :(
These things doesn't even feel like they were made to arouse people, rather to trigger vanilla fans; not a single good sex pannel

See this story more like a introvert-girl growing up rather than a classical delusional dude facing reality. Facts: novels were just a hobby for her at that time. Slut or not, who cares on a hentai story.

I rly like this story. I say good to the MC getting fucked over. He deserves it. I mean, to wait until he wins the award to confess? It just showed that in the end, he lost. And like the award judges/committee said, he just simply didn't truly understand a woman's heart. I bet he only got past the preliminary just because his writing technique is good rather than the content being good, therefore being marginally better than other author-wannabe newbs. So did he not account for not winning? What then? Would he not have confessed at all? And this is why he lost. If you really want something, then just go for it. That's why blondie won. He didn't just simply waste time on what ifs and theories in writing, he actually applied himself on getting the girl. And I bet if it was the MC with her on that train, he would've gotten cucked by the molester anyways. So she really lucked out on getting the better guy, esp in that he didn't turn her into the town slut. I need more stories like this.

@Eikunobaka You were almost close. It's not that he's a nuisance. It's that she no longer values him. Because the way they interacted, it could be said that she also had or had the potential to have feelings for the MC. But since she went with the blonde guy, the MC has no longer place in her heart. Therefore, the Pakito- guy below is more spot on. The MC meant something to her from 4/12 all the way up to 5/19 (on that sidenote, he was way overdue lol. Such a loser. Can't even return a book on time lmao), but now he means nothing to her. That's why his name is now crossed out as a reflection of her heart. While the blonde guy came into her life on 6/9 (lol 69 nice) and his due date/return date section is crossed out to signify that he's part of her life indefinitely now. But my question is whether it was her that wrote it or the guy that wrote it. But I guess that doesn't really ultimately matter. What matters is that he's kicked out of her life now. And I say to that: Good.

@Eikunobaka
The bitch still want to become Novelist or something?

I understood what the last picture means, that's a library book loan receipt, the book that was being used had the name "How to Become a Novelist", in which case the first name on the list is the girl's, what it's crossed out is the MC's name and what's next is the guy who is having sex with the fmc, in this case the MC helped the girl to try to become a novelist, now becoming the mc's classmate, the MC's name crossed out is probably interpreted as a nuisance
Pg 41: To me the library card represents their respectives relationship somehow, mc the past, blonde guy now. The fact that his name was even crossed was funny.
Guys, What is happen in page 41?
Wait. Did this hentai do a fast forward montage on the sex scene to get to the ntr story parts? lol
Lmao I love the brain dead logic all these authors have, once these girls try sex once their whole personality changes.. fucking retarded
Anyone can explain what in second last page means?
i hope this get a retranslate
Not netorare, the buff guys just played the game and won. The other idiot was busy with his self doubt.
shit, author humiliate  love, girls and hobbies, fuck this
yikes...so just a cum dumpster ending and she booted herself out of the club
Dude was kind of a chad ngl
Wait what was the second last panel mean? Why that glasses guy is really shocked about it?
I hate hentai that's tag as Netorare but is not really ntr
I don't understand the 2nd last panel
That afterword lol..... I would be amused if someone actually did try to do that.
hardly any ntr lmao
this guy below me is doubting me
Page 12 as if anyone ganna read that wall of texts anyway.

Huh, jusy like the author's other work, despite it looks rape-y, the stealer has the sense of responsibility. Not to mention this one actually tried to learn about the girl's interest. And if you think about it, what he did is no different with the MC, it's just he's more honest with his intentions. Also is that last page a way of saying that the MC's relationship with the girl has "ended" and past the due. While the other dude has no due? It's the only thing that in the back of my mind actually, not to mention the MC's name got crossed out like that, it kinda bugs me in what did it mean with that...
533 underwhelming

Crazy as it may be, I didn't feel bad at all from this, even when there's some weak NTR in it, in a sense. This reminds me of an ex-friend, let's call him (D), that looked like he NTR'd me but nah I wasn't into the girl (G) at all cuz we were really good friends (and still are). So after a few times that (G) and I went to happy hour, (D) would always showed up and (G) would go with him when we'd have enuff drinks. Alright, I got it, I wasn't stupid. I stopped hanging out with (G). Fast forward, after 5-6 months, (G) started inviting me for drinks again. I asked what's up, she never told me, then went back to drinking. I heard later on some rumors spreading that (D) was sorta upset (G) used him for favors and only wanted a fuck-buddy. I think it's bullshit, but yea, lol. (D) ended up moving away and we hadn't spoken since. There's my story.
it's bland

For the male Mc why he's simping like she's the only girl in whole world I can't stand this type of guy cause if she is going with someone else just move on for fucks sake why tf he's showing like he got heart attack or something it's so frustrating man
honestly would read a normal manga about the first guy, he seems chill
